resources.string: Compressed images in the selected folder

Optichamu is an image compression app that uses the latest Android APIs to provide a fast and efficient way to compress images. It is designed to be easy to use, with a simple and intuitive interface that allows you to quickly select and compress images. The app also supports a wide range of image formats, including JPEG, PNG, and WebP. Whether you need to compress images for your website, social media, or personal use, Optichamu is the perfect solution.
